body_content.explanation: not easy to use or learn, especially without any special training or practice:
examples: For first-time users, the software can seem unfriendly and nonintuitive.
The puzzles were too non-intuitive to be done within the short time limit.

body_content.explanation: not what you would expect based on beliefs or feelings, although maybe true in fact:
examples: For some, these conclusions may seem so nonintuitive that they must be wrong.
The loss of animal species can have some dramatic and non-intuitive consequences for human communities.
